officialTitle: Effect of Empagliflozin on Hepatic Glucose Metabolism: Role of Autonomic Nervous System
inclusionCriteria:
* eGFR\>60 ml/min healthy volunteers type 2 diabetes patients who otherwise healthy
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 65 Years
exclusionCriteria: * eGFR \<60 T2DM patients on insulin, GLP-1 RA or SGLT2 treatment Major organ disease type 1 diabetes
